entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
